err_access: You don't have access to perform this action.
name: Name
liked_by_X_people: {count, plural, one {# person likes} other {# people like}} this
network_error: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
err_flood_control: You're doing this too much. Please try again later.
time_X_minutes_ago: {count, plural, one {# minute} other {# minutes}} ago
time_in_X_minutes: in {count, plural, one {# minute} other {# minutes}}
about_X_posts: {count, plural, one {# wall post} other {# wall posts}}
comments_show_X_replies: Show {count, plural, one {# reply} other {# replies}}
qsearch_hint: Start typing a name or paste a link
unsupported_remote_object_type: Objects of this type are not supported.
remote_object_not_found: Remote object not found. It may be deleted, or you may have specified an incorrect link.
remote_object_network_error: Network error while retrieving the object from the remote server.
max_attachment_count_exceeded: You can add no more than {count, plural, one {# attachment} other {# attachments}}.
birthday_reminder: {day, select, today {Today} tomorrow {Tomorrow} other {}} is {names}'s birthday.
content_type_X_audios: {count, plural, one {# audio file} other {# audio files}}
X_comments: {count, plural, =0 {No comments} one {# comment} other {# comments}}
comments_show_X_more_replies: Show {count, plural, one {# more reply} other {# more replies}}
remote_object_loading_error: Failed to load the remote object.
err_access_user_content: This user has chosen to hide this page.
err_access_content: You do not have access to this page.
X_users: {count, plural, =0 {No users} one {# user} other {# users}}
account_frozen_info: {name}, we have temporarily frozen your account because you have violated the server rules.
account_frozen_info_time: You will be able to unfreeze your account {time}.
account_ban_message: This account was blocked by a moderator with the following comment:
account_frozen_unfreeze: To unfreeze your account, you will need to confirm that you are its owner.
account_frozen_unfreeze_password: To unfreeze your account, you will need to confirm that you are its owner and change your password.
account_suspended_info: {name}, we have permanently suspended your account because you have repeatedly violated server rules. Your account will be deleted {deletionTime}. Until then, you are able to download your data or set up a redirection to another server and move your followers.
account_ban_contact: If you have any questions, you can contact us.
account_deactivated_info: You have deactivated your account. It will be permanently deleted {deletionTime}.
action_confirmation_text: A code was sent to {maskedEmail}. Please enter it to confirm {action}:
err_file_upload: The server was unable to store your file because of an internal error. Please try again later.
err_file_upload_image_format: Your image file is damaged or of an unsupported format. Try converting it to JPEG or PNG.
err_file_upload_too_large: Your file exceeds the maximum size of {maxSize}.
remote_object_timeout: Timeout exceeded while waiting for response from {server}.
shared_by_X_people: {count, plural, one {# person} other {# people}} shared this
repost_post_done: This post will appear on your profile and in your friends' and followers' feeds.
repost_comment_done: This comment will appear on your profile and in your friends' and followers' feeds.
remote_interaction_enter_identity: You are viewing this on {localServerDomain}, where you aren't logged in. Enter the address of the server where your account is hosted or your full username:
remote_interaction_explanation: This website is part of the fediverse, a decentralized social media platform. With an account on just one server, you're able to interact with everyone on the entire network, wherever they are.
remote_interaction_signup: If you don't have an account, you can create one on this server.
remote_interaction_signup_request: If you don't have an account, you can request an account on this server.
remote_interaction_embed_post: You can also embed this post on your website.
remote_interaction_embed_comment: You can also embed this comment on your website.
remote_interaction_bad_domain: Unable to find the redirect URL. Please make sure you entered your server address correctly.
comments_show_X_more_comments: Show {count, plural, one {# more comment} other {# more comments}}
commenting_restricted: Author has restricted who can comment on this
account_deactivated_redirect: You have set up a redirection to {newProfileName} on server {serverDomain}, transferred your followers there and deactivated this profile. Right now, your profile displays a notice that you're no longer using it, and a link to your new one. You can:
account_deactivated_redirect_reactivate: Remove the redirection and restore the profile
